_description: A homily by Friar Michael Kildare — fifteen 10-line stanzas

BLHar913.First Lines:
Swet ihesu hend and freþat was istrawȝt on rode
                    tre…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…Fram þe schour of pinis sureþou sild him her and
                    þare
BLHar913.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.190-4.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 81-5.
